item.title: Effect of Migration on Residential Segregation - An Agent Based Model
item.description: India Pulse is an Aadhaar pulse is an ongoing project between the Indian School of Business and the Office of the Divisional Commissioner of Maharashtra, that aims to leverage the Indian digital identity Aadhaar to accomplish objectives of effective last-mile delivery of welfare schemes and proactive, data-driven decision making.

item.title: Clarence Stein Institute Interactive Database Viewer
item.description: This interactive database viewer was built as part of a year long project of revamping the Clarence Stein Institute of Urban and Landscape Studies at the Department of City and Regional Planning, Cornell University. This product was one of the deliverable in my year long appointment at the Institute from August 2017 to August 2018. The interactive database documents the projects funded by the Institute from its establishment in 1992 to 2015.

item.title: Transportation Infrastructure Development in Africa - Implications and Opportunities for Community Engagement
item.description: The full presentation can be accessed here Talk given at Becker House, Cornell University (Fall 2017) based on a term long study of transportation infrastructure projects in Africa, focusing on the implications and opportunities for community engagement.

item.title: India Pulse
item.description: Model Files in Netlogo

item.title: Urban Governance in India; Policies, Provisions and Reforms
item.description: The research will primarily focus on urban areas in India, as defined through the Census of India definitions. The first section will provide a brief overview of the history of governance in India. It is relevant due to the fact that many of the laws established during the colonial rule in India, especially those pertaining to cantonments and towns considered significant by the British have shaped the modern governance policies in India.
